korean: 가을이 와서 길거리 나뭇잎이 예쁘게 물들었다.
날씨도 선선하고 하늘도 맑아서 기분이 좋았다.
가을이 제일 좋은 계절인 것 같다.
english: Fall has arrived and the leaves on the streets have turned beautiful colors.
I walked in the park and enjoyed the autumn foliage.
The weather was cool and the sky was clear, so I felt good.
I think fall is the best season.
